In fact I haven't found yet a way to make the DLCs work either in this version or any other.

i even tried to install the .dat files from the other DLC i have in my other game and it didn't work either. Even though it did ask me if i wanted to replace the files, so my guess is that the dlcs may be there but they just wont work for some reason.

Guys, DLC WORKS!!!!

1.- Go to your Sleeping Dogs folder and move tis files to another folder:

SKIDROW
steam_api.dll (optional)
steamclient.dll (optional)

2.- Download This: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7604668/Sleeping_Dogs_Crack_1.5___DLC_by_RMS421_%28tags_updated%29

3.- unrar and copy this files to your Sleeping Dogs folder:

LumaEMU
steam_api.dll
steam_appid
Steamclient.dll
ValveAPI.dll

4.-EDIT LumaEMU
GameLenguage = french

to 

GameLenguage = english

5.- Start Game
